game.name: OCTOPATH TRAVELER II
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 2018년 발매 후, 전 세계 출하 및 다운로드 300만 장을 돌파한 「옥토패스 트래블러」의 시리즈 완전 신작 RPG. 도트 그래픽과 3D CG를 융합한 「HD-2D」 그래픽이 한층 더 진화한 모습을 선보인다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This game is a brand-new entry in the OCTOPATH TRAVELER series, the first installment of which was initially released in 2018 and sold over 3 million copies worldwide.

reviewHighlights.text: I really enjoyed myself.. up to a point. The moment I played the demo, I was in. Loved the look, loved the music, story wasn't a masterpiece but there...
I want to start with saying that the story and gameplay are good, the problem is how the two don't work together and causes jarring discrepancies betw...
